nodes.text: StarForge Shipyard was a shipyard located on StarForge Station as of 0 ABY.

The shipyard was formed by the parents of Chidee Na Maak on StarForge Station. He took over running the operations after they died in an accident. It was able to produce light combat vehicles. It specialized in fixing badly damaged starships and building custom designs from customers. It had three spacedocks and a waiting time of three months for service. The work of the yard was considered to be top quality, and other repair bays on StarForge would give discounts to ships built in StarForge Shipyard.
